Item

Class LifeItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • Utility.Entity
        • Item.Item
          • Item.LifeItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class LifeItem
extends Item
    LifeItem extends Item and gives life (potion or a heart). LifeItem is an item which contains a lifeValue that represents how much the item heals the player. The item is added to the inventory and when checked on it heals the player.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Kevin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
